intro: Psychotria tephrosantha, commonly known as the yellow psychotria, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias, and is characterized by its small, opposite leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, white or yellowish flowers that are often fragrant. It is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Its botanical features make it an important species in ecological studies and ethnobotanical research.
